smallDeal.heading: You Find a Great Deal!
smallDeal.description: Older 2/1 house, repossessed by government agency. Ready to go with government financing and a tenant. Take out a loan if you must, but BUY THIS!
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: You Find a Great Deal!
smallDeal.description: Company bought transferred-manager's 2/1 house. No current tenant, it has been on market six months and it has just been reduced. Take out a loan if you must, but BUY THIS!
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: Condo for Sale - 2BR/1BA
smallDeal.description: Bank foreclosure! 2/1 condo in a desirable neighborhood close to jobs and stores. Make offer, favorable financing by bank.
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: Condo for Sale - 2BR/1BA
smallDeal.description: Older 2/1 condo offered by young couple who want to move up to a 3/2 house due to growing family. Available soon.
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: Condo for Sale - 2BR/1BA
smallDeal.description: Parents selling 2/1 condo used by their child in college town. Lots of demand for rentals in this area.
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: Condo for Sale - 2BR/1BA
smallDeal.description: Excellent 2/1 condo with many extras. Owner wants to relocate for dream job FAST! She's moving up- you can too! No Cash Flow, but a possible capital gains opportunity
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: House For Sale - 2BR/1BA
smallDeal.description: Nice 2/1 house available in a depressed market due to layoffs. Would make a good investment property for the right buyer.
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: House For Sale - 2BR/1BA
smallDeal.description: Not lived in six months, this bank-foreclosed house just reduced. Loan includes estimated repair costs.
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: House For Sale - 2BR/1BA
smallDeal.description: Nice 2/1 rental house suddenly available due to estate closing. Well-maintained older property with existing tenant.
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: House For Sale - 2BR/1BA
smallDeal.description: Low down payment to pick up this 2/1 house. Owner/seller unexpectedly moving out of town. Right person will do well.
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: House For Sale - 2BR/1BA
smallDeal.description: 2/1 house in an older area offered by the Highway Department. The market has crashed and the city MUST sell. No Cash Flow but a possible capital gains opportunity.
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: Mutual Fund - GRO4US Fund
smallDeal.description: Powerhouse market drives fund's price up to record high
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many units as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price

smallDeal.heading: Mutual Fund - GRO4US Fund
smallDeal.description: Brilliant young fund manager. Everyone believes he has the Midas touch
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many units as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price

smallDeal.heading: Mutual Fund - GRO4US Fund
smallDeal.description: Lower interest rates drive market and fund to strong showing.
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price

smallDeal.heading: Mutual Fund - GRO4US Fund
smallDeal.description: Weak showing in job growth causes lack of consumer confidence. Shares fall with public opinion.
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price

smallDeal.heading: Mutual Fund - GRO4US Fund
smallDeal.description: Weak earnings report leads to weak price of mutual fund.
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many units as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price

smallDeal.description: Booming market leads to record share price of this electronics seller!
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price.

smallDeal.description: Low interest rates lead to favorable share price for this electronics seller.
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price.

smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price.

smallDeal.heading: Stock - MYT4U Electronics Co.
smallDeal.description: Record interest rates lead to substandard share price for this electronics seller
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price.

smallDeal.heading: Stock - OK4U Drug Co.
smallDeal.description: Booming market raises share price of this longtime pharmaceutical company.
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price.

smallDeal.heading: Stock - OK4U Drug Co.
smallDeal.description: Low inflation leads to high share price for this long time pharmaceutical company.
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price.

smallDeal.heading: Stock - OK4U Drug Co.
smallDeal.description: Inflation worries cause poor share price for this longtime pharmaceutical company.
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price.

smallDeal.heading: Stock - OK4U Drug Co.
smallDeal.description: Research and development delays cause low share price for this longtime pharmaceutical company
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price.

smallDeal.description: Interest rates cripple share price of this longtime pharmaceutical company.
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price.

smallDeal.heading: Stock - ON2U Entertainment Co.
smallDeal.description: Box office hit by children's division causes record share price.
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price.

smallDeal.heading: Stock - ON2U Entertainment Co.
smallDeal.description: Strong demand for company's library of old movies leads to good share price.
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price.

smallDeal.heading: Stock - ON2U Entertainment Co.
smallDeal.description: New director of movie acquisitions brings revived prospects for share price.
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price.

smallDeal.heading: Stock - ON2U Entertainment Co.
smallDeal.description: Movie buyer fired after third mega-flop! Shares sink. Chairman's bonus canceled.
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price.

smallDeal.heading: Stock - ON2U Entertainment Co.
smallDeal.description: Newest theme park is a huge flop, reports record losses. Share price hits all-time low.
smallDeal.rule: Only you may buy as many shares as you want at this price. Everyone may sell at this price.

smallDeal.heading: Coin Collector Liquidates
smallDeal.description: A coin collector needs cash quick to shore up a tax issue.Will sell you five(5) gold coins, well below going rate.
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: Friend Needs Cash Quick
smallDeal.description: A friend has urgent need for money.Will sell you ten(10) gold coins, well below going rate.
smallDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

smallDeal.heading: Sister-In-Law borrows Money
smallDeal.description: Sister-in-law is downsized.Needs $5,000 to make house payment. She promises to pay you back $10,000 after she finds a new job.
smallDeal.rule: If you choose to help. Pay $5,000 and roll 1 die:
subRule: Die = 1-3, She never pays you back and you're out $5,000
Die = 4-6, She pays you back $10,000, but family get-togethers are still awkward

smallDeal.heading: Where There's a Will...
smallDeal.description: A distant relative passes away. You are named in the will but need to travel to attend.
smallDeal.rule: If you attend, pay $750 and roll 1 die:
subRule: Die = 1-5, You are bequeathed an elderly cat. Enjoy!
Die = 6, You are bequeathed ten (10) Gold Coins. Add these to your Asset sheet.

smallDeal.heading: What's in the Box?!
smallDeal.description: You have the option to purchase a locked filing cabinet at an estate sale.
smallDeal.rule: If you buy the cabinet, pay $500 and roll 1 die:
subRule: Die = 1-5, You find...ABSOLUTELY NOTHING in the cabinet.
Die = 6, You are...ten (10) Gold Coins.CHA-CHING! Add these to your Asset sheet.

smallDeal.heading: Multi-Level Marketing Buy-In
smallDeal.description: You have a chance to invest in a Multi-Level-Marketing opportunity. Company is looking to spread the reach of their newest venture.
smallDeal.rule:
If you choose to buy-in, pay $500 and KEEP THIS CARD:
Every PayDay, roll 1 die:
subRule: Die = 1-3, No returns this month, but keep trying.
Die = 4-6, Your sweat equity paid off! Collect $500.

smallDeal.heading: Multi-Level Marketing Buy-In
smallDeal.description: You have a chance to invest in a Multi-Level-Marketing opportunity. Company is looking to spread the reach of their newest venture.
smallDeal.rule:
If you choose to buy-in, pay $500 and KEEP THIS CARD:
Every PayDay, roll 1 die:
subRule: Die = 1-3, No returns this month, but keep trying.
Die = 4-6, Your sweat equity paid off! Collect $500.

bigDeal.heading: 8-Plex for Sale
bigDeal.description: Reinvesting owner offers 8-plex for sale at reasonable price. Financing already in place. All it needs is your down payment.
bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

bigDeal.heading: 8-Plex for Sale
bigDeal.description: Professional person urgently needs cash to save partnership. 8-plex is being sold to raise capital. Great opportunity for the right person.
bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

bigDeal.heading: 8-Plex for Sale
bigDeal.description: Owner's legal troubles lead to forced sale of this 8-plex. Jump on this deal before someone else does.

bigDeal.heading: 8-Plex for Sale
bigDeal.description: Owner offers his 8-plex at the current, appraised value. It has all the amenities renters look for. Fully rented at market rent with excellent records.
bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

bigDeal.heading: House for Sale - 3Br/2Ba
bigDeal.description: Divorce leads to sale of this 3/2 house in an area full of owner-occupied homes. It has been on the market for five months.
bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

bigDeal.heading: House for Sale - 3Br/2Ba
bigDeal.description: 3/2 house near the airport. Low cost and lots of cash flow potential, if you can stand the noise.

bigDeal.heading: House for Sale - 3Br/2Ba
bigDeal.description: Split level 3/2 house on out-of-way golf course offered by heirs of owner. Golf membership is included

bigDeal.heading: House for Sale - 3Br/2Ba
bigDeal.description: Businessman needs cash to save his business and is liquidating this 3/2 house. It is currently occupied by a happy tenant.

bigDeal.heading: House for Sale - 3Br/2Ba
bigDeal.description: 3/2 house in rough neighborhood. Positive cash flow even though rents are weak.

bigDeal.description: Nice 3/2 house with inground pool and all appliances available in upper-middle-class area. Good schools.

bigDeal.heading: House for Sale - 3Br/2Ba
bigDeal.description: Downsized manager cannot afford payments on new salary and must sell this 3/2 house.The surrounding area is in transition.

bigDeal.heading: House for Sale - 3Br/2Ba
bigDeal.description: Skilled tradesman kept this 3/2 house in excellent condition, so it commands top-dollar rent in older neighborhood.
bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

bigDeal.heading: 4-Plex for Sale
bigDeal.description: Older 4-plex available - forced sale. Out-of-state, financially-distressed owner years behind on taxes. Some records available.
bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

bigDeal.heading: 4-Plex for Sale
bigDeal.description: 4-plex for sale in rehabilitating neighborhood. Owner being forced out by income tax liens.
bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

bigDeal.heading: 4-Plex for Sale
bigDeal.description: 4-plex next to new highway for sale. Owner/occupant moving to quieter area. Priced for quick sale.

bigDeal.heading: 4-Plex for Sale

bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

bigDeal.heading: 4-Plex for Sale
bigDeal.description: 4-plex in recovering neighborhood. Fully rented, repairs kept up. Needs your down payment and patience.
bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

bigDeal.heading: 4-Plex for Sale
bigDeal.description: 4-plex for sale by owner, moving to another state. Full records, fully rented, low occupant turnover in good neighborhood.
bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

bigDeal.heading: Apartment Houses for Sale
bigDeal.description: Two buildings totaling 24 units for sale. Owner managed with on-site assistant. Retirement prompts sale. Big Opportunity.
bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

bigDeal.heading: Apartment House for Sale
bigDeal.description: Owner is retiring and this older 24-unit property is fully rented with great cash flow. Great location near a community college.

bigDeal.heading: Apartment House for Sale
bigDeal.description: 12-unit apartment house offered by out-of-state heirs of handyman/owner. Highly desirable location with a long waiting list for apartment units at this property.

bigDeal.heading: Apartment House for Sale
bigDeal.description: 60-unit complex available from pension fund that foreclosed on builder/owner. On-site management in place.

bigDeal.description: Family car wash in a prime location is for sale. Family feud forces sale as they want out ASAP.
bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

bigDeal.heading: Duplex for Sale
bigDeal.description: Duplex owner must sell to pay hospital bills. Two tenants are in place at this well-maintained property and it is a good investment opportunity.
bigDeal.rule: Use this yourself or sell to another player

bigDeal.heading: Duplex for Sale
bigDeal.description: Tenants in place at this investment duplex! Owner has income tax problems and needs to sell quickly.

bigDeal.heading: Duplex for Sale

doodad.heading: TAKE A TRIP TO WINE COUNTRY

charity.heading: charity
charity.description: Donate 10% of your total income and use 1 or 2 dice for next 3 turns

downsized.heading: downsized
downsized.description: Pay the amount of your total expenses to the bank and lose 2 turns

baby.heading: New Baby
baby.description: Congratulations! Your family has a new arrival

market.heading: Sewer Line Breaks
market.description: Water is everywhere at your property!.
market.rule: Pay $2000 for a new sewer line(one time). Take out a bank loan if necessary to cover these expenses.
subRule: Card applies only to person who drew it.If you own No real estate, ignore this card.

market.heading: Sewer Line Breaks
market.description: Water is everywhere at your property!.
market.rule: Pay $1000 for a new sewer line(one time). Take out a bank loan if necessary to cover these expenses.
subRule: Card applies only to person who drew it.If you own No real estate, ignore this card.

market.heading: Tenant Damages Your Property
market.description: Tenant refuses to pay rent. After the tenant has been evicted, you discover significant damage to your property.
market.rule: Insurance covers most repairs, but you still must pay $500 (one time). Take out a bank loan if necessary to cover these expenses.
subRule: Card applies only to person who drew it.If you own No real estate, ignore this card.

market.heading: Collector wants Gold Coins
market.description: Wealthy collector is looking for gold coins. Cash offer of $500 for each coin.
market.rule: Everyone may sell any number of coins at this price.

market.heading: Stock - OK4U Drug Co.
market.description: OK4U begins trail on possible life saving drug. Side effects are untested. Could change the world... if it works.
market.rule: Cardholder Rolls 1 die.
subRule: Die = 1-3,STOCK SPLITS! Everyone hwo owns OK4U DOUBLES their number of shares.
Die = 4-6,STOCK REVERSE SPLITS! Everyone who owns OK4U loses half their shares.

market.heading: Stock - GRO4US Fund
market.description: The market is in flux and there will be monumental market swings over the next few months. How will mutual funds fair in this time of change?
market.rule: Cardholder Rolls 1 die.
subRule: Die = 1-3,STOCK SPLITS! Everyone hwo owns GRO4US DOUBLES their number of shares.
Die = 4-6,STOCK REVERSE SPLITS! Everyone who owns GRO4US loses half their shares.

market.heading: Stock - MYT4U Electronics Co.
market.description: MYT4U takes a gamble on new home entertainment tech. Will it hit big or be the next Beta-Max?
market.rule: Cardholder Rolls 1 die.
subRule: Die = 1-3,STOCK SPLITS! Everyone hwo owns MYT4U DOUBLES their number of shares.
Die = 4-6,STOCK REVERSE SPLITS! Everyone who owns MYT4U loses half their shares.

market.heading: Plex Buyer

market.rule: Everyone may sell any number of properties at this price.
subRule: If you sell, pay off the related mortgage and give up the cash flow on this property.

market.heading: Price of Gold Soars
market.description: The Central Bank is printing money in an attempt to boost the economy causing massive inflation. The price of gold skyrockets. Buyer offers $2,000 for each gold coin.
market.rule: Everyone may sell any number of coins at this price.

market.heading: Price of Gold Soars
market.description: Rioting Overseas. Oil prices threatened. Price of gold skyrockets. Buyer offers $1,000 cash for each gold coin.
market.rule: Everyone may sell any number of coins at this price.

market.heading: New Management System
market.description: A new management system creates new efficiencies and lowers costs. Only the person who drew the card is affected.
market.rule: ALL businesses with a cash flow of $1000, or less, have their cash flow increased by $400.

market.heading: Small Business Boom!
market.description: The downtown economy has exploded! EVERYONE is affected.
market.rule: ALL businesses with a cash flow of $1000, or less, have their cash flow increased by $250.
